intro: Randia miquelii, commonly known as Miquel's randia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its opposite, simple leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It produces small, round fruits that are typically red when mature. Randia miquelii is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and flowering habit.
